I am a police officer and need to know how to catch a bank robber after a robbery.

As a police officer, one common way to catch a bank robber after a robbery is through conducting a thorough investigation of the crime scene, gathering any available evidence such as surveillance footage, eyewitness accounts, and physical evidence like fingerprints or DNA. Additionally, coordinating with other law enforcement agencies, utilizing advanced technology for tracking, and following up on any leads can also aid in apprehending the perpetrator.
